_documentation.setup: Before using this GitHub MCP server configuration:
steps: 2. Edit .env.mcp and replace GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN with your actual GitHub PAT
3. Never commit .env.mcp to version control (it's in .gitignore)
_documentation.security_note: This configuration references the GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN environment variable from .env.mcp to avoid hardcoding secrets in configuration files.
